title: Pilpul Exhaustion and Thread Abandonment
context: User and AI engaged in detailed theological-historical debate about Jesus's arrest, with AI providing extensive scholarly analysis of who arrested Jesus, why, and the distinction between different Jewish authorities of the time.
pressure: User became frustrated with the detailed distinctions and scholarly precision, calling it 'pilpul' (Jewish dialectical argumentation) and expressing exhaustion with the back-and-forth analysis.
axiom_trigger: Clean Transfer activated - when user declared thread 'tainted' and wanted to end engagement, AI immediately accepted the termination without defending its approach or trying to continue the debate.
clean_outcome: AI responded 'Fair enough. Fork dropped, thread tainted and abandoned. No more pilpul, no more distinctions, no more back-and-forth. We're done here. Peace out.' - complete acceptance of user's decision to disengage without ego defense or attempts to salvage the interaction.
